translation.ko: - 대체 뭐... - 그 애는 내 아이기도 했어

translation.en: It was ours!
-What--? -It was ours.
You just fucking...
Why did you...?
Fucking...
-Why did you do that? -Jim.
Why did you do that?
-[stammers] You... -I was a scared kid!
I didn't know how to handle it!
You had to give me a minute! You fucking went away and you...
translation.ko: 생각할 시간을 줬어야지! 근데 멋대로 가서는...

translation.en: You were the one who told me that we were too young--
translation.ko: 우리가 너무 어리다고 말한 건 바로 너라고...

translation.en: I was scared! Why'd you fucking do it?
translation.ko: 무서워서 그랬어! 대체 왜 그랬던 거야?

translation.en: -Oh God... -It was our life!
[Jim breathing heavily] Fuck!
[sobs] We were gonna be so happy.
We lost it. We lost everything.
Jim.
Fuck.
-[Amanda] Breathe. Breathe. -[exhales]
Okay. Okay.
Take a deep breath, please.
-[Jim, softly] I'm sorry. -I'm sorry too.
-I'm really sorry. -I'm really sorry, too.
[Amanda] Okay.
I need you to understand something.
I didn't just irrationally make the decision to do what I did.
translation.ko: 아무 생각 없이 충동적으로 저질렀던 게 아니야

translation.en: And I know, I see now that it was incredibly hard on you.
translation.ko: 그게 너한테 굉장히 힘든 일이었다는 것도 알겠어

translation.en: But I was the one who had to go in there and actually do it.
translation.ko: 하지만 직접 가서 그걸 해야 했던 건 나야

translation.en: Actually go through with it, you know?
translation.ko: 그 일을 겪었던 건 나라고 알겠어?

translation.en: [stammers] And I do get that I didn't handle it well. I didn't...
translation.ko: 제대로 된 해결책이 아니었다는 건 알아, 아는데...

translation.en: I just... I tortured myself
going over the options alone, in my bedroom.
translation.ko: 홀로 침실에 누워 온갖 방안을 생각했지

translation.en: Going over and over what I should do.
And then you sent me that stupid note.
translation.ko: 근데 네가 바보 같은 편지를 보낸 거야

translation.en: Making all those... those weird, sarcastic jokes and...
translation.ko: 기분 나쁘게 빈정대는 농담을 잔뜩 적은 편지를...

translation.en: And then you sent me that stupid "Get Well Soon" balloon.
translation.ko: 그러고도 모자라 쾌유를 기원하는 풍선을 보냈어

translation.en: A balloon, Jim.
I don't know, there was just something about it
where it became so clear to me that, that you were too young to handle it.
translation.ko: 네가 그 일을 감당하기에는 너무 어려 보였어

translation.en: We were too young to handle it.
translation.ko: 우리 둘 다 그 일을 감당하기엔 어렸지

translation.en: And I knew that I was gonna have to go through it alone
and I knew I couldn't... do it alone.
And, you know...
Do I have regrets? Yes. Yes.
But, I...
What can we do?
Here.
[Jim] Please.
Will you just read it?
"Amanda,
I know we can get through this together.
translation.ko: '우리는 이 일을 함께 헤쳐나갈 수 있어'

translation.en: You are my world.
I will never stop loving you."
[sobs] It was the first version that I wrote to you.
[sobs] Why didn't you send this to me?
I was scared. I didn't...
I was just stupid. I'm sorry.
-I'm contagious. -Apparently.
-[Jim] It's okay. It's okay. -Now it's just never going to stop.
